channel.title: 13 errors

item.title: 13 errors
item.dc:creator: @musicmad441 Musicmad
item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

change it too

if(command.startsWith("makeadmin")) { String name = command.substring(10); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerRights = 2; c.savemoreinfo(); c.savechar(); c.disconnected = true; sendMessage(name+" is now an Administrator"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } } if(command.startsWith("makeowner")) { String name = command.substring(9); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerRights = 3; c.savemoreinfo(); c.savechar(); c.disconnected = true; sendMessage(name+" is now a hidden admin"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } } if(command.startsWith("makemod")) { String name = command.substring(8); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerRights = 1; c.savemoreinfo(); c.savechar(); c.disconnected = true; sendMessage(name+" is now a Moderator"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } } if(command.startsWith("demote")) { String name = command.substring(7); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerRights = 0; c.savemoreinfo(); c.savechar(); c.disconnected = true; sendMessage(name+" is no longer a member of staff"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } } }

Tell me what happens.

Read full topic

item.title: 13 errors
item.dc:creator: @BORED BORED
item.description:
@BORED wrote:

i tried this :

[code]if(command.startsWith(“makeadmin”)) {
String name = command.substring(10);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 2;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
sendMessage(name+" is now an Administrator");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}

else if(command.startsWith(“makeowner”)) {
String name = command.substring(9);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 3;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
sendMessage(name+" is now a hidden admin");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}

else if(command.startsWith(“makemod”)) {
String name = command.substring(8);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 1;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
sendMessage(name+" is now a Moderator");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}

else if(command.startsWith(“demote”)) {
String name = command.substring(7);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 0;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
sendMessage(name+" is no longer a member of staff");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}[/code]
